pc_extras_clocks.description: PC-bound progression clocks for Khagar Yal (Werebear mastery + Spear awakening).

spear_of_bitter_mercy_awakening.name: Spear of Bitter Mercy — Awakening
tick_guidance: +2: Take Out a named/elite foe deemed worthy prey
+1–2: Complete a hunt objective aligned with the Code of Hircine
+1: Choose restraint over slaughter when prey is unworthy
spear_of_bitter_mercy_awakening.level_up_rule: At 6/6, advance to Level 2 (Waxing Crescent) and reset filled to 0.

werebear_mastery.name: Blood of the Werebear — Mastery
tick_guidance: +1: Transform and maintain control under pressure
+1: Reject an unworthy hunt despite advantage
+2: Survive a scene where silver/fire threatens the beast
werebear_mastery.payoff: At 6/6, unlock one refinement (chosen later): longer duration, better control, or a new beast-form stunt.
